artifact.content:
Use Case #: UC1 Name: Manage user accounts
Authors: M4 Event: Administrator performs create, retrieve, update, and cancel actions on various user accounts.
System: Administrator and system console
Actors: Administrator
Overview: This use case utilizes various sub-use cases to demonstrate the administrative activities done on users.

Use Case #: UC2 Name: Manage devices
Authors: M1 Event: An administrator performs add, remove, enable, disable, test, and reset on new and existing devices.
System: Administrator, system console, phone subsystem
Actors: Administrator
Overview: This use case captures the process of the administrator adding a new phone to the system using the system console. It also captures the process of the administrator removing, enabling, disabling, test, and resetting an existing phone in the system.

Use Case #: UC3 Name: Manage billing Authors: M3 Event: An administrator updates the billing plan for a department or registers a payment.
System: Administrator and system console
Actors: Administrator, department manager
Overview: This use case captures the process of the administrator changing the billing plan of a department, and registering the payment of an invoice to the system.

Use Case #: UC4 Name: Access voicemail Authors: M3 Event: An employee accesses his or her voicemail for messages or to change voicemail options
System: Employee, phone subsystem and system console
Actors: Employee Overview: This use case captures the process of an employee accessing his or her voicemail

Use Case #: UC5 Name: Make call Authors: M2 Event: User places a call. System: System console
Actors: Caller, Callee
Overview: The process of a call being attempted, connected, and completed.
